text: "Only" is a hip-hop song by Trinidadian-American rapper Nicki Minaj featuring rappers Chris Brown, Drake, and Lil Wayne, released on October 28, 2014. It is from Minaj's third studio album, The Pinkprint, as it is the third single from the album.https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/only-feat.-drake-lil- wayne/id934621980 "Only" is described as a hip hop sing with "icy" production that sits "omniously" under dirty lyrical metaphors. ==References== Category:2014 songs Category:Drake (musician) songs Category:Lil Wayne songs Category:Nicki Minaj songs Category:Hip hop songs
title: Only (Nicki Minaj song)
